mapper.select: select user_id,user_name,password,id_card,state,create_time,login_name from user where state=1 and login_name=#{loginName}

select user_id,password,user_name,id_card,state,DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %h:%m:%s') create_time,DATE_FORMAT(update_time,'%Y-%m-%d %h:%m:%s') update_time,login_name from user where state=1
and user_name like CONCAT('%',#{userName},'%')
order by create_time desc
select user_id,user_name,password,id_card,state,create_time,login_name from user where state=1 and user_id=#{userId}
